Quotes.quote: Hard choices, easy life. Easy choices, hard life
Quotes.author: Jerzy Gregorek

Quotes.quote: It’s easier to change yourself than to change the world
Quotes.author: Naval

Quotes.quote: They tried to bury us they didn't know we were seeds.
Quotes.author: Tim Ferris

Quotes.quote: You don’t rise to the level of the competition. You fall to the level of your training
Quotes.author: Archilochus

Quotes.quote: Pressure, nah. Fam, this is just playing ball. Pressure is the homeless man, who doesn't know where his next meal is coming from. Pressure is the single mom, who is trying to scuffle and pay her rent.
Quotes.author: Damian Lillard
